src:
Live Streaming Bournemouth vs Manchester United di Mola TV
02 Nov 2019, 17:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United (MU) sedang berada dalam performa positif setelah memenangi tiga laga terakhirnya di semua kompetisi. Menantang Bournemouth,The Red Devils takkan ragu mengincar tiga poin.
Peringkat 7 Manchester United (MU) akan bertandang ke Vitality Stadium untuk menghadapi peringkat 9 Bournemouth pada pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/20, Sabtu (02/11/2019).
Tengah pekan kemarin, MU menyingkirkan Chelsea di babak 16 besar Carabao Cup. MU lolos berkat kemenangan 2-1 di Stamford Bridge. Pasukan Ole Gunnar Solskjaer menang berkat performa impresif Marcus Rashford, yang memborong dua gol lewat eksekusi penalti dan tendangan bebas spektakulernya.
Dalam dua laga sebelumnya, yang juga merupakan laga-laga tandang, MU mengalahkan Partizan Belgrade 1-0 di Liga Europa dan Norwich City 3-1 di Premier League.
Sementara itu, Bournemouth tanpa kemenangan dalam lima laga terakhirnya di semua kompetisi (M0 S3 K2). Dalam dua laga terakhirnya di Premier League, mereka berturut-turut imbang 0-0 menjamu Norwich City dan melawan tuan rumah Watford.
MU perlu memanfaatkan momentum positif mereka, sekaligus form buruk lawan, untuk mengamankan poin maksimal demi perbaikan peringkat di klasemen sementara.
text:
Live Streaming Bournemouth vs Manchester United on Mola TV
02 Nov 2019, 17:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United (MU) is in positive form after winning its last three matches in all competitions. Challenging Bournemouth, the Red Devils will not hesitate targeting three points.
Rank 7 Manchester United (MU) will travel to Vitality Stadium to face 9th place in Bournemouth in Week 11 of the Premier League 2019/20, Saturday (11/02/2019).
In the middle of last week, Manchester United eliminated Chelsea in the last 16 of the Carabao Cup. MU escaped thanks to a 2-1 victory at Stamford Bridge. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's men won thanks to Marcus Rashford's impressive performance, who bought up two goals through penalty execution and his spectacular free kick.
In the two previous matches, which were also away games, Manchester United beat Partizan Belgrade 1-0 in the Europa League and Norwich City 3-1 in the Premier League.
Meanwhile, Bournemouth are without a win in their last five matches in all competitions (M0 S3 K2). In their last two Premier League matches, they have consecutive 0-0 draws to entertain Norwich City and against host Watford.
MU needs to take advantage of their positive momentum, as well as the opponent's bad form, to secure maximum points for the sake of improving the ranking in the standings.
